casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Robert R. KRILICH, Sr., Defendant-Appellant. No. 02-1445. United States Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Jan. 27, 2003.

Before EASTERBROOK, RIPPLE, and EVANS, Circuit Judges.

Order

Defendant-appellant filed a petition for rehearing and rehearing en banc on January 14, 2003. No judge in regular active service has requested a vote on the petition for rehearing en banc,* and all of the judges on the panel have voted to deny rehearing. The petition for rehearing is therefore DENIED.

Judge Flaum did not participate in the consideration of the matter.
